# opnsense_settings_firmware_plugin (Resource)

Manage an OPNsense firmware plugin.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "opnsense_settings_firmware_plugin" "os_nginx" {
  package   = "os-nginx"
  installed = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `package` (String) Name of the package.

### Optional

- `installed` (Boolean) Whether this plugin is installed.
